title: 5 points from The Only Way Is Essex we just had to address
text:
5 points from The Only Way Is Essex we just had to address 5 points from The Only Way Is Essex we just had to address 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
If you thought the tears and tantrums of The Only Way is Essex stayed in Essex, then youâ€™d be mistaken as the drama continued to unfold in Marbella. 
We joined the gang on their holiday in the south of Spain for yet another explosive episode â€“ and it wasnâ€™t all cocktails and smiles. 
Well, what did you expect with this lot? 
1. Arg is STILL struggling to get his driving license. 
If we remember correctly, Arg launched a mission to pass his theory somewhere around the second series of TOWIE. Now, 14 series later, Arg still hasnâ€™t managed to conquer it and no-one could quite believe it. I can't believe #towie has been on for five years and @RealJamesArgent still hasn't managed to even pass his theory test ðŸ˜‚
